TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 408
TEI.2.document_title: Aniseto Artega to Stephen F Austin, 06-06-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Aniseto Arteaga to Austin, Guadalupe Victoria, June 6, 1830. Notifying Austin that by Terán's orders he is establishing a garrison on the Labaca and may call on Austin for supplies. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 408

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Aniseto Arteaga to Austin, Guadalupe Victoria, June 6, 1830. Notifying Austin that by Terán's orders he is establishing a garrison on the Labaca and may call on Austin for supplies. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p* *location_mentioned*Guadalupe*/location_mentioned*,*date_mentioned n="06-06-1830"> June 6, 1830*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
